#summary How to use annotations both in python2.6 and python2.5
= Introduction =

A short example of how concordion annotations are expressed in pyConcordion.

= Details =

==In python 2.6==
{{{
from concordion.annotation import ExpectedToFail

@ExpectedToFail
class AnnotationExampleTest:

        def isFalse(self):
                return False
}}}
==In python 2.5==
{{{
from concordion.annotation import ExpectedToFailClass

class AnnotationExampleTest(ExpectedToFailClass):

        def isFalse(self):
                return False
}}}
